name: Google Array
description: This is based off Google Variety but with my own twists. CLICK CUSTOMIZE SETTINGS

user.name: Gibbu
user.about: About me: I like to mostly create dark themes to make it easier for your eyes, but I do like to change it up from time to time. I also like to try and make my themes customizable, so you can change the look and feels of the theme. Social stuff: My Website My YouTube My Twitter My Twitch

additional_info: V1.2 (May 15th, 2018): ► Fixed Right search panel. ► Allowed users to input their own keywords for the background image. └ If left blank it will just use whatever image is featured for daily or weekly. ► Allowed users to turn off Search page banner and footer fade effects. ► Home and Search page search bars are now the same. V1.1 (May 12th, 2018): ► Fixed areas that would overlap. ► Changed font to Roboto. ► Minor tweaks to elements to fit the style better. V1.0 (May 8th, 2018): ► First release.

style_setting_options.label: Yes
